boat.name: Carlotta
boat.full_description: Carlotta has cruised extensively in the West Country and Brittany.
boat.short_description: Carlotta is a Heard 28 built in 1993.

for_sales.sales_text:
Built in Mylor by Martin Heard.
LOD: 8.5m
Draft 1.5m
Beam 3.0m.
Launched in 1993. The GRP hull is based on the Falmouth working boats.
Decks: wood sheathed in epoxy.
Coach roof mast and spars are all wooden.
Deck stepped mast in tabernacle. Roller reefed main sail, staysail new 2018, jib, topsail and asymmetric balloon jib. Roller furling for staysail and jib.
Engine Yanmar 3HM35, 30hp. New chart plotter with AIS receiver installed on cockpit bulkhead in 2015.
Standing room from galley and chart table through to the forepeak and heads. 5 berths in two cabins.
Plastimo Neptune 5000 two burner cooker and oven, fridge and Eberspacher heater.
Lying Chichester.
for_sales.summary: removed from general sale at request of sole broker
